isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - VIBRATION DAMPER, CRANKSHAFT, MAIN BEARINGS, FLYWHEEL AND CRANKCASE - COMPONENT CHANGES - FRONT ENGINE SUPPORT AND REAR MOUNTING BRACKETS

svcproc.title: FRONT ENGINE SUPPORT AND REAR MOUNTING BRACKETS
svcproc.para:
Effective with S/N 567492 (1989 Model Year), the front engine support and rear mounting brackets are redesigned to improve on eliminating engine vibration. The new front engine support is designed to bolt directly to the crankcase replacing the earlier support which bolted to the front cover plate. The rear mounting brackets have been increased in length and reinforced in design ( Figure 7.8
).

note.para: To accept the new direct crankcase bolt-on configuration, either modifications to the existing front cover plate and plate gasket are required or installation of a new front cover plate and gasket (as described in TIMING GEAR TRAIN AND FRONT COVER) are needed.
